## User follows post condition

**User follows post**Â condition checks if the current user [follows](docs.getvoxel.io_articles_follow-functionality_.md) a post.

The condition provides the option to include a post ID. If not ID is provided, it references the current post

## Example

Show or hide post content depending if the user follows that post
